command: function outTotalF0() { curl -s --connect-timeout 5 --retry 3 -f http://localhost:65012/api/v1/metrics/prometheus |grep '^fluentbit_output_proc_records_total{name="forward.0"}' | awk '{print $2}' ;}; T="$(outTotalF0)";test -e ./m_outTotalF0 && { test $(cat ./m_outTotalF0) -ge $T && { echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') outTotalF0 freeze: $T"; exit 1;} ;}; test $T -ge -10 && { echo "$T" >| ./m_outTotalF0; } || true;
cat /etc/resolv.conf; until curl http://etcd.ves-system.svc.cluster.local:65535/health | grep health | grep true; do echo 'Failed sleeping 10s'; sleep 10; done
initContainers.name: etcd-check
